message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers.

Looking at the financial statement, particularly the income statement, I need to find the line item that represents these costs.

In accounting, "Selling Expenses" typically represent the costs associated with securing customer orders and delivering goods/services to customers. These include sales commissions, marketing expenses, advertising, delivery costs, and other customer acquisition expenses.

In the income statement provided, I can see the following line item:
- Selling Expenses: 793,728.19

This is the value that represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '793728.19'} }
```
